cli_content:
IP Route Table for VRF "default":
Maximum parallel paths: 1 (vrf default 2)
Number of IPv4 routes: 12
Number of IPv6 routes: 3
  Route Source    Networks
  connected       6
  static          4
  OSPF-100        6
textfsm_template:
Value ROULTES_NUM (\d+)
Value IPV6_ROUTES_NUM (\d+)
Value CONNECTED_ROUTES_NUM (\d+)
Value STATIC_ROUTES_NUM (\d+)
Value OSPF_ROUTES_NUM (\d+)

Start
  ^Number\s+of\s+IPv4\s+routes:\s+${ROULTES_NUM}$$
  ^Number\s+of\s+IPv6\s+routes:\s+${IPV6_ROUTES_NUM}$$
  ^\s+connected\s+${CONNECTED_ROUTES_NUM}$$
  ^\s+static\s+${STATIC_ROUTES_NUM}$$
  ^\s+OSPF\-\d+\s+${OSPF_ROUTES_NUM}$$
